review: [[ASIN:B00CX5P8FC Amazon Fire TV]I'd expressed interest in Amazon Fire TV after my son ordered a unit.  He a surprised us with one as a gift.  It offers many things that I didn't expect.  I was wondering why, as a 'Prime' member I would want one for movies, etc.  There are so many things available in free Apps that link you to science, automotive, gardening, cooking shows, news, music, etc etc that I was surprised.  This might be an answer, somewhat, to the high priced cable/satellite TV we pay for.  It's still new to us, so we're still exploring the possibilities!

review: When it works, it works very well.  I have experienced nothing but problems with the Fire TV since the day I got it 4 months ago.  I constantly experience random crashes.  Sometimes it will freeze up and crash 3 times an hour!  I have contacted Amazon support multiple times and get the run around every time.  They are useless.  I do not recommend this product.  I will be purchasing a Roku instead.
